name: UnifiedAttribute
description: A unified attribute for the List

content.name: x
content.description:
the X position of the button
default: 0.0

content.name: y
content.description:
the Y position of the button
default: 0.0

content.name: angle
content.description:
the angle of the button
default: 0.0

content.name: width
content.description:
the width of the list
default: 100.0

content.name: item_height
content.description:
the height of individual items within the list
default: 10.0

content.name: horizontal_margin
content.description:
the margin applied to the left and right of text and other similar elements within items
default: 5.0

content.name: vertical_margin
content.description:
the margin applied to the top and bottom of the list
default: 0.0

content.name: items
content.description:
the items that the list contains
default: []

content.name: style
content.description:
the style of the list
default: the default value of the "Style" structure
